comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
Perhaps this is a regression in TPTP4.3 AGR, as it works fine with TPTP4.2.1 AGR.

This blocks the creation of any verification hooks in TPTP AGR Tests.

AGR used:  org.eclipse.tptp.test.auto-TPTP-4.3.0.zip
JVM used:  IBM J9 VM J2RE1.5.0 SR3
Eclipse SDK Version: 3.2.1, Build id: M20060921-0945

Steps to create problem

1.Create an AGR test suite and a test case within it.
2.During the recording phase of the test case, try to add a verification hook. You will notice that the status in the recording interface changes from "status:recording" to "status:generating the source....".  However, it does not change to "status: select a target (a view, editor or dialog)" as one would normally expect.
3. In fact, even after clicking on a view, editor or dialog, the status still remains at status:recording" to "status:generating the source....".
4. Upon, stopping the test case recording process, one may see in the XML script generated for the test case that there is no <verification> element.



More information:
